Others: Denver Nuggets head coach Michael Malone praised Russell Westbrook's defensive effort, calling him a 'rockstar'.
Westbrook led the Nuggets with 29 points, 6 assists, 6 rebounds, and 1 steal.
Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon were out due to injuries.
Westbrook has been scoring 20+ points in the past two games and shooting 60% in the past two games.
Westbrook has averaged 1.8 steals per game, his best since his final season in OKC in 2018-19.
Westbrook will likely return to a bench role when Jamal Murray returns.
The Nuggets secured their biggest win of the year with a 124-122 victory over the Oklahoma City Thunder.
